CustomField.formula: ISPICKVAL( Supported_Days__c , '7 Days') || ISPICKVAL( Supported_Days__c , '24/7') || ISPICKVAL( Supported_Days__c , 'Monday to Saturday') || ISPICKVAL( Supported_Days__c , 'Other') || ISPICKVAL( Supported_Hours__c , '24/7') || ISPICKVAL( Supported_Hours__c , 'Other') || ISPICKVAL( Availability_Days__c , '7 Days') || ISPICKVAL( Availability_Days__c , '24/7') || ISPICKVAL( Availability_Days__c , 'Monday to Saturday') || ISPICKVAL( Availability_Days__c , 'Other') || ISPICKVAL( Availabilty_Hours__c , '24/7') || ISPICKVAL( Availabilty_Hours__c , 'Other') || ISPICKVAL( Availability__c , '99.9%') || ISPICKVAL( Availability__c , 'Other') || ISPICKVAL( SLA_Reporting_Obligation__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Cloud_SLA_Reporting__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Cloud_Service_Credit__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Cloud_Service_Credit__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Service_Credit__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Service_Credit__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Non_Std_Support_SLA_Defns__c , 'Yes')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically set to true if there are non-standard supported days or hours, cloud availability days, availability %, support sla reporting, cloud sla reporting, support service credits, cloud service credits or other non-std support sla defns.
CustomField.label: Non-Standard Support Terms
